---

import MethodEndpoint from '@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint';
import ParamsDetails from '@theme/ParamsDetails';
import RequestSchema from '@theme/RequestSchema';
import StatusCodes from '@theme/StatusCodes';
import OperationTabs from '@theme/OperationTabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';
import Heading from '@theme/Heading';

<Heading as={'h1'} className={'openapi__heading'} children={'Create a new transfer'}></Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={'post'}
  path={'/accounts/{account_id}/transfers'}
  context={'endpoint'}
></MethodEndpoint>

Creates a new transfer using the specified source and destination details.

<Heading
  id={'request'}
  as={'h2'}
  className={'openapi-tabs__heading'}
  children={'Request'}
></Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[
    {
      name: 'account_id',
      in: 'path',
      required: true,
      schema: { type: 'string' },
      description: 'The ID of the account',
    },
    {
      in: 'header',
      name: 'Idempotency-Key',
      required: true,
      schema: { type: 'string' },
      example: 'idemp-demo-123456',
      description:
        'A unique string used to prevent duplicate operations. Each POST request must use a new idempotency key. Use a UUID or timestamp-based string. Example: `idemp-123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000`  \n',
    },
  ]}
></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={'Body'}
  body={{
    required: true,
    content: {
      'application/json': {
        schema: {
          type: 'object',
          properties: {
            amount: {
              type: 'object',
              properties: {
                value: { type: 'string', example: '100' },
                currency: { type: 'string', example: 'USD' },
              },
              required: ['value', 'currency'],
            },
            source: {
              type: 'object',
              properties: {
                value_type: { type: 'string', example: 'USD' },
                transfer_type: { type: 'string', example: 'wire' },
                address_id: {
                  type: 'string',
                  nullable: true,
                  example: 'd7bd28e4-93e6-4313-880c-ab9178eacd3b',
                },
                financial_institution_id: {
                  type: 'string',
                  nullable: true,
                  example: 'b3cd57f4-9999-4a2e-a888-bf78dfa8c624',
                },
              },
              title: 'TransferEndpoint',
            },
            destination: {
              type: 'object',
              properties: {
                value_type: { type: 'string', example: 'USD' },
                transfer_type: { type: 'string', example: 'wire' },
                address_id: {
                  type: 'string',
                  nullable: true,
                  example: 'd7bd28e4-93e6-4313-880c-ab9178eacd3b',
                },
                financial_institution_id: {
                  type: 'string',
                  nullable: true,
                  example: 'b3cd57f4-9999-4a2e-a888-bf78dfa8c624',
                },
              },
              title: 'TransferEndpoint',
            },
          },
          required: ['amount', 'source', 'destination'],
          title: 'TransferCreateRequest',
        },
      },
    },
  }}
></RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{
    '201': {
      description: 'Transfer successfully created',
      content: {
        '*/*': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: { id: { type: 'string', example: '9f80c1f5-80df-4c5e-9b68-b9f5712d46d4' } },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  }}
></StatusCodes>
